attributes.action: Stop restaurants supplying bread etc. to the table that is not complimentary, without stating so
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stop restaurants supplying bread etc. to the table that is not complimentary, without stating so.
I am sick of going to restaurants and having bread pushed onto the table without requesting it! They then have the audacity to charge for the unrequested items on the bill! If I go to a supermarket they do not put a dozen eggs in my barket - so how is it that restaurants get away with such practices?
